_header: Jesu my lief Jesu my love Jesu my coveting
Subjects: love, toward Jesus; Christ, love toward
_description: A song of Love Longing, possibly by Richard Rolle — eleven couplets with numerous medial rimes

BodDonC13.First Lines:
Ihesu my lefe Ihesu my loue Ihesu my couetyngeto þe me langis
                    nyȝte & day þou ert al my ioynge…
BodDonC13.Last Lines:
…Ihesu kinge þat made al thing of a maiden was bornhelp
                    our hoping & our lyuyng on þat we be not lorn
BodDonC13.Editions:
Brown,  Beatrice Daw. 
             “Religious Lyrics in MS. Don. c.13.” 
             Bodleian Quarterly Record
         7 (1932): 1-7 plus frontispiece facsimile of f. 166: 4-5.
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             Richard Rolle: Uncollected Verse and Prose.
         EETS o.s. 329 (2007): 33-4.
